name: PolyOne-Uppers
description:
This is a project I created to learn more about development with C# and Unity.

This is card game that uses Top Trumps rules with the exception of turn order. The player always goes first.

Known bugs:

  • The cards will end their flip wider than when they started. This does not happen in the development environment. I have no idea why it happens.
